t: USA: How outdoor and snow sport retailers thrive despite Amazon
s: August 4, 2022 - Similar to the development in Europe, the US outdoor and snow sports market saw an increase in online shopping activity alongside the Great Recession in the 2000’s. Brand acquisitions and discontinuance as well as many shop closures followed and are still ongoing and measurable today.
